answers.answer: If your early on in pregnancy you wont be able to see anything, sometimes around week 5 you will be able to see a sack, alot of the time you will have to have a vaginal ultrasound to even see this, by the time you get to around the 6 wk mark a visable sack and fetal pole will possibly be seen sometimes even a heartbeat although alot of the times you dont see the heartbeat until around wk 7-8, so try to relax

thank u so much i feel a lil better...it just scares me cuz the doc couldnt see anything and made it seem that was not good and that it could be a tuboc pregancy i think thats what its called..and that i would need to have surgery asap...thats if they cant see anything again this tusday and of what the bllod test say how far along i am cuz the doc said i should be 5 weeks...but im just scared and stressed:{

he shouldnt scare you like that...... like I said if he didnt do a vaginal u/s its extremely difficult to see anything at 5 weeks also they use your last menstral period to date a pregnancy you may have ovulated abit later in your cycle as well, it also depends on the skill of the person doing the u/s and the age of the machine makes a difference, if your doctor just did it in his room, and not send you to a specialist place that would also be another reason for not seeing anything, if the same thing happens again the next visit, DO NOT take any medicine he may want you to take to bring on a miscarriage, ask to be referred to a place that specialises in pregnancy u/s for another scan, unless your having symptoms of a tubal pregnancy you shouldnt worry too much about that, the symptoms for that dont usually show up until around 5-7wks and again the use of a transvaginal u/s combined with irregular rises in hcg and sometimes abdominal pain to the side will help diagnose a tubal/eptopic pregnancy

oh they usually get you back in 1-2 weeks so your going back earlier than 1 wk so things maynot have changed that much, I would ask for a referal as I said and if he wont give you one, can you go to another doctor for a second opinion

im sorry that i keep writing to u...but yea he did do a vaginal ultra sound...they also worried cuz of my diabetes but i really dont see why that would have anything to do wit it i take care of my diabetes so i dont see why it would do somthing to my pregnacy...n i did have abdominal pain really bad the doc knos that too..and they did tell me somthing about taking a pill to termanate the pregncy if it is a tubal eptopic pregnacy...i all ready had one missgarage me for and i went through hell and i really dont want to deal wit it again...

ok well if they confirm its eptopic then of course you should take the piil as they can be extremley dangerous, so  the options are checking your hcg levels to see if they're rising as they should and if eptopic is ruled out again I can only stress to you at this stage dont be too worried if they can onnly see a sack at your next scan, Ive had plenty and at 5wks you wont see mcuh else, maybe a yolk sac inside, I still think its a wee bit early for your next scan but hopefully something will be visable by then, also you can experience cramping when your just pregnant, it sometimes feels like a pulling tugging sensation or like premenstral cramps, you will have to be monitored a bit closer having diabetes but alot of women have this condition and go on to have successful pregnancies :) dont worry about asking question I'll try to help if I can :)

thank u luv...so u really dont think that they will tell me its eptopic pregancy cuz its to soon by the next vist or do u think they will wait a lil longer and keep making me come in to see what is goin on?

I think they will have more of an idea with the combination of blood test and scan, but with all the scans that I have been to they have always made me come back 2 wks later so they can have a clearer  picture of what maybe going on, I can understand him wanting to get on top of it if it is eptopic to avoid the risk of your tube rupturing and you needing surgery, but I just think 9 times out of 10 its just too early to see anything

question: hi my name is lexii and im 24 n prego i just found out thursday the 22 and the next day i went to see my doctor and they did a altrasound on me and theytold me and i also seen nothing on the altasound but that i was prego and that i could have a tubic pregnacy and that i have to go back this tuday because if it is that they have to do surgery asap but that also it could be real early too and thats why they cant see a sac or the egg...but im real scared cuz from what i been reading u can see somthing if u r prego on a altrasound but my doc and i didnt see anything so is there anyone that can help me out or let me kno if thats normail and be real wit me that its a tubic pregancy and that the baby  wont make it thank u
title: pregnacy
